company_info.title: Company Information
company_info.name: Numispark
company_info.address: 832 Route Tilleul Fol Enfant, 27300 Saint-Martin-du-Tilleul, France

hosting.title: Hosting
hosting.address: 340 S Lemon Ave #4133, Walnut, CA 91789, USA

intellectual_property.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual_property.content: The content of this website (texts, images, videos, etc.) is the exclusive property of Numispark, unless otherwise noted. Any reproduction, representation, modification, publication, or adaptation of all or part of the elements of the site, by any means, is prohibited without prior written permission from Numispark.
intellectual_property.unauthorized_use: Any unauthorized use of the site or its content will incur civil and/or criminal liability of the user.

data_collection.title: Personal Data Collection
data_collection.protection_laws: Personal data is protected by Law No. 78-17 of January 6, 1978 (as amended), the GDPR of April 27, 2016, and Article L. 226-13 of the Penal Code.
data_collection.collected_info: This site collects personal information only for the services offered, including: contact form, quote requests, newsletter, job applications.
data_collection.user_consent: The user provides this information knowingly.
data_collection.mandatory_info_notice: Users are informed which fields are mandatory or optional.

cookies.title: Cookies and Browsing Data
cookies.usage: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience and analyze site usage.

google_analytics.description: This site uses Google Analytics, an analytics service provided by Google Inc.
google_analytics.data_usage: Data generated by cookies about your use of the site will be transmitted to Google.
google_analytics.consent: By using this site, you expressly consent to the processing of your data by Google.

cookies.disable_notice: You can disable cookies via your browser settings. This may prevent the use of certain features.

rights.title: Right of Rectification
rights.description: Under the law and the GDPR, users have the right to access, rectify, delete, and object to their data.
rights.exercise_rights: To exercise these rights, contact Numispark by email with your identity details.

liability.title: Liability
liability.accuracy: The information on this site is as accurate as possible but may contain errors or omissions.
liability.report_issue: Report any issues by email to [email to be completed].
liability.hardware_damage: Numispark cannot be held liable for material damage caused by the use of the site.

links.title: Hyperlinks
links.external_links: Clicking on certain links will take you off this site. Numispark is not responsible for the content of external sites.

jurisdiction.title: Applicable Law
jurisdiction.text: Any dispute relating to the use of this site is subject to French law. Exclusive jurisdiction is vested in the courts of Évreux, unless otherwise required by law.

updates.title: Updates to Legal Notice
updates.text: Numispark may modify this legal notice at any time. Users are encouraged to review it regularly.
